job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent years of relevant experience

jd: Hello, Job descriptionWe are looking for a Senior IT Project Manager (Infrastructure, Security, Cloud technologies, Applications etc.) in California who previously worked for a University or Higher Education.NO Program or Product Managers!7+ years of solid project management (USA Experience).Work experience primarily on Infrastructure, Security, Cloud technologies, Applications etc.Must have demonstrable skills delivering projects in close collaboration with multiple stakeholders, vendors and implementation partners.Must have demonstrable project delivery skills.Highly advanced skills associated with end-to-end PMLC for programs/projects of large -scale scope.Certification: PMP (MUST – Proof required)Tool proficiency (MUST): Microsoft Project , JiraAble to drive project from initiation to closure with smooth handoff to operations teams.Organize project work into Phases, Work streams Track and report status on entire project, individual phases, individual work streams, milestones, resource utilization, project finances (incl. burn-down).Comfortable with presenting to executives, sponsors, business leadership team.Proficient in Waterfall & Agile methodologies.Thorough in maintaining all project artifacts –charter, executive material, RACI, RAID log etc.Skillful in project plan creation using MS project.Create project dashboards.End to end effective meeting facilitation (Clear Agenda with outcome, next steps, publishing Minutes, track actions etc.).Establish project governance & communication plans with clarity.Self-starter.Proactive; ‘can do’ problem solving attitude; effective navigating ability in ambiguity.Ability to understand organization dynamics & adapt.Audience-specific communication/artifacts.Establish clear roles, responsibilities, ownership.Superior communication skills – Written & Verbal .Ability to influence.
